title: Welcome to My Data Science Portfolio
text:
Welcome to my data science portfolio! This site shows my journey learning data science and analytics. Here you’ll find projects that demonstrate what I’ve learned and discovered.


This portfolio shows my work learning data science. Each project includes:

My code with documentation
Visualizations I created
What I learned and discovered

I built this site using Quarto and host it on GitHub Pages.




Programming: Python, Pandas for data analysis
Visualization: Creating charts with Matplotlib and Seaborn
Data Collection: Getting data from files, websites, and APIs
Analysis: Finding patterns and answering questions with data







Learn how I explore datasets to find interesting patterns and answer questions.



See how I gather data from different sources and prepare it for analysis.



See how I tackle a data science project beginning to end.



Thanks for visiting! Feel free to explore my projects and see what I’m learning.

Code






Jillian Baker


Statistics · Data Analytics · BYU  <br>
<a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/jillian-baker-48093b284"
   style="opacity:0.85;">
   My LinkedIn↗




Introduction
Statistics major with a Data Science emphasis at Brigham Young University, expecting to graduate in 2027. I am currently developing strong analytical and problem-solving skills to prepare for a career in data-driven decision making. My coursework is equipping me with a solid foundation in statistical methods, data analysis, and programming, and I’m eager to apply these skills in real-world projects and internships.
Interested in using data science to uncover insights, optimize processes, and support strategic decision-making. As I continue my studies, I’m building experience with tools such as R and Python and gaining a deeper understanding of data visualization, statistical modeling, and applied analytics.

Education
Brigham Young University
Statistics: Data Analytics Emphasis Jan 2025 – Dec 2027
Brigham Young University-Hawaii
Computer Science, Accounting, And Anthropology coursework Aug 2023 - July 2024

Experience
Research Assistant · Brigham Young University
Jan 2025 – Jun 2025 · Provo, UT (Hybrid)

Built Python scripts to extract targeted records from large genealogical databases
Automated data cleaning and transformation pipelines
Exported structured CSV datasets for statistical modeling and storytelling

Officer – Data Science Association · Brigham Young University Sep 2025 – Present · Provo, UT

Designed and distributed event flyers and promotional materials to advertise association events
Coordinated email outreach to professors and students to increase awareness and attendance
Helped grow and maintain consistent event attendance of 20–30 participants per event
Supported community building and engagement within the university data science community

Data Science & Statistical Modeling Projects · Brigham Young University Aug 2025 – Present · Provo, UT

Performed exploratory data analysis (EDA) using Python and R to identify trends and anomalies
Applied statistical inference, regression, and experimental design techniques to real-world datasets
Created visualizations and summaries to communicate insights to technical and non-technical audiences
Practiced model validation and interpretation to support data-driven decision-making

Operations & Customer Analytics Experience · Various Organizations (Baker Cleaning, Chunky Cookies, Air Guitar, BYU JFSB) Jun 2022 – Dec 2025 · Gilbert, AZ | Laie, HI | Provo, UT (On-site)

Held multiple customer-facing and operations roles requiring reliability, accuracy, and teamwork
Balanced work responsibilities with academic commitments
Developed strong time management and communication skills
